name: The Ultimate Snake 3d
description:
Game prototype.
How to play:
Eat food and don't let the enemies crash into your head.
Game moments:
Food:
 Yellow - simple
Green - +speed
Blue - -speed
White - +rotation speed
Pink - -rotation speed
Red - superfood
Enemies:
if an enemy collides with an enemy, they die
If an enemy touches your tail, he dies.
If an enemy touches the red part of your tail, you die.

Tail: You can crawl trough your tail, but red parts will kill you
